ValidationRule.description: Only profiles:Apollo: Custom- Customer Services, System Administrator can Close Won the opportunity. For MSP type opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL(Business_Group__c, 'MSP'), OR( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISCHANGED(Business_Group__c) ), NOT( OR( $Profile.Name = 'Apollo: Custom- Customer Services', $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Permission.Closed_Won_Opps ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Finance and System Administrator can set the stage to Closed Won.
